data.title: Sandy Martinez Named Advocate Health Advisors Regional Manager
data.meta_description: Sandy Martinez Named Advocate Health Advisors Regional Manager - Dallas, TX - Martinez is responsible for recruiting and supporting insurance agents in Dallas / Fort Worth and El Paso, Texas; and Las Cruces, N.M.
data.text:
Martinez is responsible for recruiting and supporting insurance agents in Dallas / Fort Worth and El Paso, Texas; and Las Cruces, N.M.

Advocate Health Advisors has named Sandy Martinez as Regional Manager. In this role, Martinez will be responsible for recruiting, training and supporting insurance agents in Dallas / Fort Worth and El Paso, Texas; and Las Cruces, New Mexico.

Advocate Health Advisors agents are Medicare experts who serve as trusted advisors for those who are Medicare eligible and specialize in helping those turning 65. The company has agents in all 50 states and the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.

“We are happy to welcome Sandy to help us grow our team of agents in Texas and New Mexico and to continue to help seniors with their healthcare choices,” Advocate Health Advisors National Business Director Jeff Crumbaugh said.

Martinez has worked in El Paso throughout her 17 years in the insurance industry. Prior to joining Advocate Health Advisors, she was an agent manager with UnitedHealthCare.

“I am looking forward to building relationships with agencies and growing our brand in the communities we serve,” said Martinez, who will be based in the Dallas region.

Martinez is a member of EPIC (El Paso Immunization Coalition) and the National Association of Insurance and Financial Advisors. She enjoys giving back by volunteering at the El Paso Food Bank and The Salvation Army. If you would like to get to know more about Martinez, you may connect with her on LinkedIn.

About Advocate Health Advisors

Advocate Health Advisors is a veteran-owned national field marketing organization in the Medicare market. Our agents are Medicare experts and specialize in assisting people who are turning 65. Headquartered in Venice, Fla., Advocate Health Advisors is licensed in all 50 states and the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico. The company’s system of carefully chosen and vetted agents connects seniors to the best medical care available. | Video : CEO Darwin Hale on launch of company
